attributes.action: Help get sign language taught in schools as a lesson.
attributes.additional_details: This as been an on going debate for many of years, then just swept under the carpet, it would help if the government or parliament help with such an important situation that everyone needs to be aware of and been able to do this needs to go higher up to the people that can't actually do somthing about it.
attributes.background: Listen to others about how to make a change in this happening and get the word out to millions of schools about signing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make teaching BSL mandatory in all schools
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702139
